name: extend_exclude
description: Javascript object _extend()/_exclude() for deeply operate two object

scripts.iife: mkdir -p iife && rollup -f iife -n extend_exclude --no-strict src/extend_exclude.js | uglifyjs -c -m -o iife/extend_exclude.js
scripts.amd: mkdir -p amd && rollup -f amd -u extend_exclude src/extend_exclude.js -o amd/extend_exclude.js
scripts.cjs: mkdir -p cjs && rollup -f cjs src/extend_exclude.js -o cjs/extend_exclude.js
scripts.es: mkdir -p es && rollup -f es src/extend_exclude.js -o es/extend_exclude.js
scripts.make: npm run iife && npm run cjs && npm run amd && npm run es

author: mithriljs_cn
